name: NPC
text: There is no time to lose!

name: NPC
text: You need to rescue your wife!

name: NPC
text: Let me make the story short… Some time ago, between fifty minutes and one hour, when I was thinking somewhere over the rainbow where the people are living for today...

name: NPC
text: AN ORC TOOK YOUR WIFE FROM THE TOWER!

name: NPC
text: There is no time to lose! Go and rescue her!

name: NPC
text: Come on! Why are you still here?

name: NPC
text: Ok, fine… We can stand here and probably nothing will happen, because it’s only a game…

name: NPC
text: I think I left the iron on...

name: NPC
text: I think I need to get supplies for the party tomorrow...

name: NPC
text: Eh, I think we should go save your wife... You remember what I said right?
